Review.Contenu: I'm trying to take advantage of the 5 year manufacturer's warranty on the C2G docking station I bought from CompSource. Long story short, Legrand needs the vendor that purchased the device from them, not the reseller, to contact them on my behalf for them to honor warranty. After talking to CompSource on the phone today I guess they bought the device from D&H. I've never had to do this for a manufacturer's warranty issue ever in all of my IT experience but Legrand is telling me this is the only way they will honor their warranty. Not sure why CompSource would call D&H, to have D&H call Legrand on my behalf or how the reimbursement would even work with 3 companies involved. Most likely Legrand is betting that is the case, and I'm out $250-350 dollars. Legrand is definitely going to ruin C2G.

I've left similar feedback on the Legrand website.From a user perspective, C2G/Legrand is becoming less-and-less useful to us.  The order entry and fulfillment is MORE challenging than ever.  When I put a P/N into Legrand, it says it doesn't exist.  Put in C2G, it exists.  Try to enter order in C2G, won't take it.  Logoff/Login to C2G, order goes thru.  Call later to check on order, and I'll be told that "it prints here at the end of the day, then gets sent there, then has to be reviewed, then it will be processed, then it will be picked (if still in stock at that point), then will (might) ship.Legrand should look at a company like McMaster-Carr and learn how to execute.  They probably have 100X as many SKU's, but process and ship 99% of orders within several hours of order placement.  And they probably have a smaller staff than Legrand.My guess is that Legrand get's its collective !@#$ together, or goes out of business in the next few years.  With all respect, Mr. Shane must be rolling over in his grave...

As this would not work for me I asked them to cancel the order but they could not. They advised me that I would need to wait till the following day to speak to someone about the order. Then I asked for a Manager to call me and I received an email from the customer service person that was rude and unapologetic. I will never do business with this company again and recommend you do the same if you need your order anytime soon.

She was kind but her two coworkers that initially helped me ruined my experience with this company and I will not ever order from them again.

Holy hell, what a horrific ordering experience, that has only turned worse in its 25 days of non-fulfillment.1/20 Placed an order for 4 shielded Ethernet cables, that were in stock.1/24 I follow up and it's delayed due to the warehouse relocation. Annoying but they did put a notice on their website.2/1 Nope, no change. Status is still “processing”, 12 days days since ordering. Could be a 1-star review already, but we’re just getting started.I follow up again. “This warehouse is currently experiencing a 5 business day shipment delay related to them moving locations last month.” (But it’s been 8 business days.)  “The warehouse shows they have printed this order today set to ship out asap.” (Finally!) But… “At the moment I can only provide an ESD of 2/8 for this order due to this delay, but ideally my warehouse team will have this shipped out by 2/3 or 2/4 or this week.”At this point, a good company would’ve offered some reimbursement to maintain customer satisfaction. I had to ask them myself, for a shipping upgrade. Kyleigh B., the CSR, was friendly and followed up the next day, “I apologize for the inconvenience, this order is too far in the shipping process to modify.”2/9 (20 days / 14 business days since ordering) You guessed it… The order didn’t ship on 2/3, or 2/4, or 2/8. The status is… “Processing”. Kevin K. reviewed the order and immediately replied: “I have set this to ship tomorrow with free overnight shipping and have sent a notice to the warehouse to prioritize this order.”2/10 End-of-day, nope. Order has not shipped.Customer service: “That printed at our warehouse today” (so was it printed twice? 3 times? Did they lie in the past? Now? Did they lose the shipping label?) “however they're delayed due to us moving locations, it should ship next week.”2/13 (24 days / 16 business days). Status: “processing”. Zero email updates from C2G since the original order confirmation.I contact CS for the 5th time: “this order shows it has not shipped out and is on a backorder. This items is out of stock until 6/2/23.”“This items shows set for a backorder shipping date of 2/9 when opening the order, updating this material to ship out asap my system then updates this backorder date to 6/2/23.”I ask CSR to have the warehouse manually confirm the inventory status for this item.I also ask for a callback from a manager. CSR said they’ll call me, though he’s confused as to why.2/14 No communication from C2G, I reach out for the 6th (maybe 7th) time, and after 20 minutes, am able to speak to a manager.The conversation was polite, he apologized for the “miscommunication”; then suggested I cancel the order and go to their resellers’ websites to see if I can get it from them.	1.	What miscommunication? There’s a dozen problems with C2G’s handling of this order, but miscommunication isn’t one of them. If anything it shows their failure to even understand what’s been wrong and that much went wrong.	2.	According to both the CSR and the manager, C2G/Legrand has not kept cases on this, so every time I call/chat, to them it’s all from step one.	3.	There’s no awareness of how many times the customer had to reach out to CS, the recourse they’ve tried so far, or how this may affect the customer’s satisfaction. They just hear an upset customer with no tools or records to ascertain what’s been going on, besides taking the customer’s word or not.	4.	Why do they print out orders if they’re a week out from shipping them	5.	They should be able to revise a “printed” order that’s 2-5 business days from shipping.	6.	They should offer on their initiative compensation for customer satisfaction purposes, commensurate with the size of the screwup.	7.	Except for Kyleigh B. on 2/2, nobody ever reached out to me or got back to me in any way.	8.	Their CSR system should track excessively delayed orders, and issue notifications (and apologies) to customers so they’re in the loop.	9.	When I suggested that, the manager’s canned response did not even include “I will forward your suggestion” as lip service. It felt clear that none of what transpired should trigger any review or possible changes.	10.	Needless to say, their relocation appears to have been royally botched. Though from what I gathered, my case somehow got exceptionally botched.	11.	At the end of the call with the manager, I had to remind him that they should cancel the order. With a normal company I’d expect that to be handled in minutes. He took my info, it’s been 1.5 hours so far, and no notifications, and the order status is still what it was on 1/20: “Processing.”	12.	Not even talking about supply chain challenges, why it should be an extra 4 months, etc.About the only thing right were the friendly tier-1 CSR's.This is my CRM report, now where’s my $150K consultant fee.

Each controller AND the software did not come with the special "USB Admin Key" (3 ordinary adapters I had did NOT work) which is needed for programming. But each controller came with two adapters that do NOT fit either component...#*@? This further frustrated me and delayed the job! I will NOT be buying this product again.

Hopefully the cable is excellent and meets my expectations.I'm writing this review about my frustrations with the online Ordering process.First I created an account, which should make things easier.  Then I clicked Checkout, and opted to pay with PayPal.  After accepting the charges in PayPal, I was returned to the C2G website where I selected Free shipping.  But it wouldn't let me click Submit Order.  Instead I had to choose a payment method. I thought I already did. So I chose PayPal again and it said, Are you sure you want to change payment methods?  Yeah sure.  Then it asked me for my shipping address, and my email again.  And asked me if I wanted to setup an account.  I already did that.  Then it sent me to PayPal again.  I'll probably get charged twice.Finally after 20 minutes of going round and round it let me finish the order.Nowhere did it indicate how fast or slow Free shipping will be.  Hopefully it's adequate.

The concept of this Bluetooth device is exactly what I needed, however it does not function with the consistency I need for it to be adequately functional. The problem is in the connection which continuously drops out forcing a complete reconnection process each time I try to use it. If I try to stream any presentation or video from any computer to the display TV, the C2G drops the connection every 10 minutes, making it difficult to follow a complete video. Very disappointing.

If it weren't for the fact that your site was the only one with the product I needed today, I would have shopped elsewhere. I live in a relatively urban community close to Apartments and don't trust my neighbors. I prefer shipments to a PO Box which is more secure. Fortunately, the product I was buying is cheap enough that I don't mind if a neighbor steals it from my front door. But I'd rather not have to worry about this at all. Please support PO Boxes in the future.

Review.Titre: I was asked during the check out …
Review.Contenu: I was asked during the check out process to create an account then the system wouldn't let me purchase the item.  I had to log out and start the process again and check out as a guest to finally get my order placed.  What should have been a simple process took way more time than it should have.

I sent back the wrong wire, I do not understand why I should be forced to pay an additional shipping fee  when you were the ones who sent the wrong cable to begin with. I strongly suggest that you waive that fee and send me the correct cable and be done with it so that I can enjoy my movies on my TV.

Review.Titre: I ask about downloading photos from …
Review.Contenu: I ask about downloading photos from LG420 phone to computer.  She talked about charging (I already have the connection) and sent me website information.  Also I was NOT able to print the chat to have the website information. I am not feeling positive about the purchase.

My son Aaron previewed your Web site and put together a list of cables supplies that we need for him to install at our home. He emailed the list to me all I had to do is add to my cart and order. A very smooth way  to make  sale. Thank you sincerely,  Peggy Sue Novak

Frustrating--wouldn't let me check out as guest--eventually created web account and had to re-enter all data and order.Product search didn't bring up product the second time with the same description.  Whole order took over 10 minutes and was frustrating.

Ordered on Jan 6, order did not ship until Jan 9; Still haven't received my much needed cables (it is Jan 14 today). Coming from Ohio to WA seems excessively long.  BTW Shipping was not free AND order was taxed as well.  Should have ordered cables on EBay (cheaper and free shipping - faster delivery).  These cables are expensive as well compared to aftermarket types.  Figured I would go with a reputable company - very disappointed so far - Note: I haven't had a chance to judge product quality since I don't have the cables yet even though I have already been asked to review.

Had cables installed with your product a few years ago.  I needed to replace a cable.  It is no longer supported.  I now have to purchase $80 worth of cables due to the change.  I had to place 2 orders and wait more than 2 weeks to get this cable problem fixed.

The website would not allow me to move past the billing address page yesterday, it didn't like the zip code/address combination, even though I was entering it correctly. So, I did a live chat with a guy (Cody) who told me I would have to place the order by telephone. I called, only to be on hold about 10 minutes, I hung up, and did the online chat again, only to be told that after 5:00 the system stops answering calls, except it DID answer and kept me on hold, and he failed to tell me that before telling me to call. So, here I am at home on my day off, finally able to place the order.

Review.Titre: I was offered a 15% discount & it said …
Review.Contenu: I was offered a 15% discount & it said to click in to automatically received it and I didn't get it. I wasn't expecting that I had to click on again at another point. confusing & I don't have time for this, I'm annoyed.

Review.Titre: Sold pieces/parts that do not work
Review.Contenu: We have purchased the recommended solution as identified by your specialist and repurchased due to initially ordering the incorrect connectors.  The cable and connectors still do not work.  Calling your tech support again today.

The parts were fine.   Your web ordering page showed, “Order within the next 1 hr & 15 mins your will ship today”.  I did order in the next 5 mins overnight express, which was a Thursday and it did not ship until Friday which meant I received them on the following Monday.  We needed them for work on Saturday.  It was confirmed within 5 mins of my order being placed.  So I can’t give a better rating.  The web site was pretty easy to find and order my parts, they failed to get it processed and your customer service, very nice guy, but had no idea of why it didn’t ship...  Cost me time and money as I drove 56 miles one way on Friday so that I could do the job on Saturday.

If paypal is not easily utilized, it should not be an option. It kept taking me from paypal to the shopping cart and not confirming the purchase.

I expected to be able to select options for delivery and see dates.Therefore I placed an order prematurely - not knowing anything about when I would receive the item. I wish to cancel that order if it does not arrive May 1. The web site as far as I can see did not allow me to "edit" the order I just placed!I therefore placed a second order - with overnight shipping 4/28 -> 4/29 or 4/30 delivery - which is very very costly and this does aggravate me and will create conflict between me and my wife!At last I fear I will get two products (the same white audio cables) and get them too late!Please phone me asap.   By the way - your chat and your phone connections did not fucntion now.  Why offer them?SincerelyN B

An adapter product that was received as part of a Computer Defense in Depth training failed to connect my disk drives right out of the box, new or old.  I've decided to give this product another try by buying a newer version of the same model.  The live chat people and responsiveness of the Cables 2 Go team are the main reason why I'm giving this product a second chance.

Review.Titre: Credit Card information being seen my customer support…
Review.Contenu: I had trouble trying to get PayPal to work so i chatted with your help person, i think her name was Nicole. I told her that i had to go down the hall to accounting to get a Credit Card after i did this i discover she had not logged out of my screen and therefore she was able to see my Credit Card number.I hope i have no problem with my card compromised.Rick Jones/ President

Review.Titre: I tried to make a purchase using Chrome
Review.Contenu: I tried to make a purchase using my Chrome browser, but the price in the shopping cart appeared as $0.00.  Multiple attempts after clearing cookies, cache, etc., gave the same results.  I was about to look elsewhere when I decided to use IE instead.  That time it worked.  You almost lost a sale from me and you've probably lost sales from other Chrome users as well.

The products are great when I get them from C2G, but finding the right product can be a challenge with your search bar. I am a cyber technologist and so I feel that if I am having challenges, that the average user is probably not happy with the issue. Still, it is not stopping me from buying from you, but it makes it more frustrating when I know what I am looking for, but don't know how to search properly on your site for that item. A great feature that many sites are now deploying, chat online. Maybe integrate that into your platform? Thank you for taking my thoughts!

Review.Titre: I'm sorry the the service price is too…
Review.Contenu: I'm sorry the the service price is too high.   You could send via normal post cheaper.   And if I had seen the $599 previous I probably wouldn't have ordered!!   If both items work well I guess that will be OK.   It seems you should have been able at the beginning to include the $5.99!!   There is NO RUSH on getting these two cables.   I started with Walmart where most things I should be able to pick-up at the store which is a five minute drive.

Finding and placing my order was very simple.  Although the price of the item is significantly higher than other sources, I HOPE that it ships quicker than others I looked at.  I need this part very soon.  The site says 'Ready to Ship' but nowhere did I see WHEN it will ship or when I can expect it.  I had to make the assumption that it will be faster than 7-9 days as others had posted.  Feedback?

Your stupid system thinks my email is invalid yet somehow didn't notice that it worked fine for PayPal (also works fine for all other companies that I do business with). This probably explains why I don't have an account with you. So I just made up a gmail account and your system is happy -- but I'm not.

Seven days after I placed my order I hadn't gotten a delivery.  I never received an e-mail confirmation or printable receipt for the order, so I decided to look into it in my on-line account.  I could not find any information in my account other than the date I placed the order.  No tracking number or estimated time of arrival. I shop on-line almost exclusively, and providing this type on information has become pretty much standard practice.

Review.Titre: Not too bad...a few things could make you great!
Review.Contenu: Cables are just what i wanted and got here on time and the online order was simple. Better box/Shipping - this went to my customer location in a fed ex box that didnt look professional. Some nicer shipping would have looked better and gone a long way.Zip Lock bags - They look good but to improve I would have perforated bags that can be opened fasterPrice - Your price was a bit higher that what I have paid in the past. about 20-30% more

Why, in the year 2015, you don't offer Paypal as a payment option, is a total mystery. Your shipping choices leave a lot to be desired, too. Where are USPS and Postal Service options? I looked around the 'net for an acceptable alternative to your product and didn't find one. This is the reason, and the only reason, I ordered from you.

Review.Titre: A couple glitches in the process
Review.Contenu: Quick & easy account registration. Fair list prices. However, after applying the discount code, seeing the discounted price on the checkout window and proceeding with the transaction I found the invoiced amount was the non-discounted amount.  I am mildly miffed but not outraged.

Review.Titre: I hav had a terrible time trying to check out before I succeded
Review.Contenu: The website is easy to manuver. The search boxes are right on point. I used chat and the person I spoke with was very knowledgeable. The problem came when I tried to check out. I had to try on 3 seperate nights before I succeded. It kept rejecting my credit cards even though I know for certain the cards were open and had sufficient credit.

I was very impressed with the C2G website and everything about the ordering process.  My order was shipped immediately, and correctly.  All in all, a very professional company to deal with. My only issue is with the cables themselves.  They are very stiff and kind of unwieldy.  This is especially true of the Thunderbolt cable.

Review.Titre: Easy to navigate - issues with stock tracking
Review.Contenu: Small order - two items, both of them show on the item page as being in stock (200+ available for one, 3600+ available for the other). When checking out, got an "out of stock" notice. Placed the order, hope the product page and the info from the chat support person is correct, not the checkout page...

Everything was great with this website and buying of the cables.  However,the one problem was that I did not get to choose my deliverer. I normallyuse USPS, but your site only uses FedEx. This may deter me from using your site. :(IN CHRIST SERVICEGenexxaNational EvangelistOperations Director @ Magohart

I'm ordering for an educational institution that is tax exempt.  I tried to follow the directions on the website for submitting our tax exemption information, but it quickly became not worth the effort.  Why couldn't I just upload our tax exemption certificate like I do everywhere else?

The cables are good quality.  I needed two shielded cables for our PA system, and these are well made and produce no hum.  But for a $50 order, $10 in ground shipping via US mail is outrageous.  They need to find more economical shipping rates.  I'll be reluctant to order again given this expense.

Review.Titre: I could not use Amazon Pay to complete…
Review.Contenu: I could not use Amazon Pay to complete my purchase, only PayPal. The Amazon Pay kept erroring out on estimating shipping. Even if I typed my Zip code in manually, it would error out. No problems with PayPal.

Review.Titre: Shop by Categories - Forget about trying to search for a product directly
Review.Contenu: I spent 30 + minutes wandering in the wilderness because I didn't guess the same terminology used to enter the product description  in the database. Trying to use chat is merely an exercise in frustration since I can only use one hand to type due to an injury!!!

Review.Titre: Many small towns do not have street …
Review.Contenu: Many small towns do not have street delivery. I buy stuff online all the time and list my P.O.Box with no problems. If you are being paid through PayPal, what difference does it make if your product goes to a street, apartment or P.O. Box?

I wish when something was added to the shopping cart it would not change the page to the cart but rather stay on the page I'm shopping in. There is an icon always in the upper right hand corner to go to the cart when I'm ready.
Searching with keyword (HDMI extension) wouldn't find products. May have found one, but by polking around I found that you have several in different lengths. Wasn't very friendly to use.

Review.Titre: Shipping was more than the cost of the item
Review.Contenu: I was disappointed to learn that shipping was more than the item.  I purchased a $9.95 cable and the lowest option to ship was $10.95.  There is no way the actual shipping for one serial cable was that much...not a good experience.

Review.Titre: Good product catalog, prices OK, shipping absurd
Review.Contenu: Nice product selection - easy to navigate web site.  Bought a mini-display port to HDMI adapter.  Tiny thing, fits in an envelope. Didn't catch it until too late - $11 for ground shipping.  Too late for me, but buyer beware.

The blurb about the same day shipping is confusing. I think it's too long, and the language could be condensed. The idea is a common practice, so while it's important to be clear, don't make it too complicated.

The good news is they have good product selection, decent prices, and good online support.  The bad news is I find their shipping charges outrageous on small items.  If it wasn't for the S&H, 5 stars hands down.

when my card was rejected, screen did not explain why. tried multiple times which was frustrating. would have been much better experience if I was told the reason instead of forcing me to guess at the problem.

Review.Titre: Your web site said my password was no…

Review.Contenu: Didn't have quite all the info I wanted about the product at which I was looking.  Granted, it's a part for a very old printer.  Price is good, though.  Just hope I bought the right thing.

I have no issues with C2G but I don't appreciate having to pay more for ground shipping than the cost of the cable I'm buying.  Please offer simple USPS service.  Thank you for your attention to this. CA

Review.Contenu: The Items came faster than expected and the quality looks good but it was not exactly what i wanted, i wanted USB-A to HDMI adapter but the input is a different kind of USB port.

I have a tax exemption so It's confusing that Tax is shown on the order before I have to confirm the order. Yes, after I confirm the order, the tax is then zero, but still VERY confusing.

The tax exemption process took a month to complete and only got completed because I called back multiple times and complained when it wasn't finished as promised in a few days. The cables I want were on backorder with an estimated stock time of one week, but while calling about tax exemption I asked about the cables and was told that those cables were already sold as well (their order system doesn't account for orders placed against backorder stock) and that my order wouldn't be fulfilled until the shipment three months from now.  Good customer service reps, they are very polite and informative when you call, but I'd go elsewhere for anything backordered. Amazon often carries their products at a lower price.
Your web site is great and it was easy to find what I needed.  However., I was very disappointed that I could only use FedEx to ship.  I work for UPS and would at least like to see an option with us.

Review.Titre: I had a gift card I wished to use but…
Review.Contenu: I had a gift card I wished to use but it wasn't enough to cover the total and I was unable to split payment types. It really would be convenient to make that a feature when checking out.
Website is relatively easy to navigate. However, no delivery date is mentioned at checkout except a note that delivery may be delayed to fulfil previous orders???
Paypal method does not allow overnight shipping. Deficiency in the design allowing for use of Paypal. This is not on Paypal side, but on the Cart and shipping info being sent to Paypal.

Review.Titre: Why are the shipping options so limited.
Review.Contenu: I paid more for the shipping than for the connector itself.  There should be more options for shipping.  For example, one rate shipping from UPS is half of the cost for UPS ground.
